Pre-Game Insights: The United States will face off against India in Match 25 of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup at the Nassau County International Cricket Stadium in East Meadow, NY, on Wednesday, June 12 (6/12/24) at 10:30 a.m. ET.
This will be the United States’ third group stage match after overcoming the odds in a historic upset against Pakistan on Thursday, June 6.
Others: Limited tickets are available through resale platforms like Vivid Seats, SeatGeek and StubHub.
Cricket fans will need a subscription to Willow TV, which includes every game in the ICC T20 Men’s World Cup and is available as an add-on via Sling and fuboTV.
India is -1400 to win, according to DraftKings.
